title: What an awful community
body: Every game I play, its the same toxicity, people being total jerks and nothing ever happens to them, because if anything did, the problem would be solved by now. I'm sick and tired of this game being ruined by jerks with too much time on their hands and a support team that doesn't give a damn.

replies.body: If it's the same people then just mute them at the start

How the hell are you lv38 but also past season gold?

Sounds like your MMR may just be a disaster, which could explain so many toxic players.
no idea, i just came back to this game after a few years away so frankly im not entirely sure what you mean, sorry
Toxicity issue is due to the passive aggressive nature of the playerbase + the game being free to play.

i doubt that you can "fix" the toxic issue but i do agree that it feels like not enough happens. theres flame in 9 out of 10 games. and i dont mean the standard "you suck" i mean really toxic flame where ppl seem to totally lose it
ive just decided to disable chat, communicating with team isnt worth the potential flame. I urge every league player that isnt a degenerate to do the same. better to lose games than get flamed.

agreed. 
i myself sadly like to chat and try to have a friendly chat. rarely works out but imo when you find another friendly person who likes to mess around in chat its worth it.
i didnt think such a thing exists, ive never met worse people than on league
